summary: Comprehensive testing completed for ARETION Informatics Solutions landing page. All major functionality tested successfully with 100% backend API success rate and complete frontend integration working.

integration_issues.issue: Success toast notification not visible after form submission
integration_issues.note: Form submission works correctly (200 OK, form clears), but user feedback missing

passed_tests: Backend status check creation and retrieval
Frontend header with ARETION logo and navigation
Hero section with correct tagline 'Integrated Digital Ecosystem for Smarter Hospital Operations'
All 9 solution cards displayed with Coming Soon/Available badges
Contact form fields (name, email, organization, interest, message)
Contact email links (informatics@aretion.co.uk) in multiple locations
Footer with copyright 2026 and all policy links (Privacy, Terms, Code of Conduct, Anti-Bribery)
Navigation scroll functionality (Solutions, Benefits, Contact, Demo)
Demo section with correct email links for consultation and demo requests

success_percentage.frontend: 99% (All major functionality working, 1 minor UI issue)
